title: I'm really starting to hate this fucking game!

replies.body: You don't hate the game. You hate the champions that are basicly boring to lane versus.

I get what he was saying so I'll clarify:

I main {{champion:55}}.

I HATE {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:246}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:142}} 

I love the game tho. Fun game when I'm not facing more than 1 of those champs at the same time.

> [{quoted}](name=caffeine abuser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2ukPbIQA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-09-06T00:18:31.086+0000)
>
> I get what he was saying so I'll clarify:
> 
> I main {{champion:55}}.
> 
> I HATE {{champion:12}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:246}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:142}} 
> 
> I love the game tho. Fun game when I'm not facing more than 1 of those champs at the same time.

Ummm... no.
I hate uninteractive laning. Has nothing to do with Wukong and his matchups. I love fighting {{champion:75}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:517}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:14}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:78}} 

It's an action packed lane that forces me to play my best when I'm against one of them. Nothing feels better than watching a {{champion:122}} {{champion:31}} ult my decoy.

On the contrary, nothing feels worse than {{champion:555}}  jolting my decoy and killing me anyway.

Every matchup besides {{champion:45}} and {{champion:161}} is "uninteractive" for Kat, unless they screw up royally. Literally just sit back and farm under tower until they fuck up, or lose every trade.
isnt that practically the whole roster? i know a couple is missing but still.

nah it's only like a 6th of the roster lmao 

I feel him though. I find myself hating most champions in this game, but I guess that's just the way it is

Idk how he outran you, I've never had a problem sticking to a Garen as Trundle. ESPECIALLY with all of those items... normally just a BORK is enough, not even swifties. 

Maybe you're timing it poorly while he has his W active? That would be my only guess

I really can't see how it worked either. There's actually no way Garen should have been able to get away there.

He's going to have to show a replay for that, because it just doesn't add up.
Garen Q is a slow cleanse..
